name: Sticky Sailors
description:
A small retro-styled puzzle game made as a project for Devtober 2021.

Control a crew of pirates looking for treasure on their way out of a sinking ship! Instead of jumping, you throw your mates to get up on higher areas to find keys, treasures and a way out of your predicament.

Controls:
     AD or <> to Move
     SPACE to Grab and Throw
     R to Restart Current Level
     ESC to Return the Main Menu
